description.zh: 受到璃月大地的岩石认可，获授的印记。\n用来在璃月港内特定的地方兑换特殊道具。
description.de: Ein Zeichen für die Anerkennung der Felsen von Liyue.\nKann an bestimmten Orten in Liyue gegen besondere Objekte eingetauscht werden.
description.en: An insignia that shows the recognition of the cliffs of Liyue.\nCan be exchanged for special items in Liyue.
description.es: Una insignia que muestra el reconocimiento de las montañas de Liyue.\nPuede ser intercambiada por objetos especiales en Liyue.
description.fr: Un insigne reconnu par le rocher de Liyue.\nS'échange contre des objets spéciaux dans un lieu spécifique de Liyue.
description.id: Lencana yang menunjukkan pengakuan tebing Liyue.\nDapat ditukar untuk item khusus di Liyue.
description.ja: 璃月の岩に認められ、授かった印記。\n璃月港の記念品ショップで特別なアイテムと交換できる。
description.ko: 리월 대지의 암석의 허락을 받아 부여받은 표식.\n리월항의 특정 장소에서 특수한 아이템을 교환할 수 있다
description.pt: Uma insígnia que mostra o reconhecimento dos penhascos de Liyue.\nPode ser trocada por itens especiais em Liyue.
description.ru: Символ признания скалистыми горами гавани Ли Юэ.\nМожно обменять на особые предметы в Ли Юэ.
description.th: เครื่องหมายผาหินแห่ง Liyue \nใช้สำหรับแลกเปลี่ยนไอเทมพิเศษ ในสถานที่เฉพาะของ Liyue
description.vi: Dấu ấn nhận được khi có được sự chấp nhận của nham thạch vùng Liyue.\nDùng để đổi vật phẩm đặc biệt ở cảng Liyue.

popupContent.en: Find it as you climb the mountain
As you climb the lower level of the mountain, should be able to see a tree across
As you climb next to the stairs.
At the mid level of the mountain
On top of the mountain next to a rock
Hidden near the bushes on the ground
On one of the two rocks that are in the water
Climb up the mountain above the shed
On the mountain on the right of the Domain of Forgery
